1: Here I am, late to work, I hope Irileth doesn't kill me...
Irileth: You must be joking, in over 3 hours past your post time.
1Button2: Cap' you wouldn't get it, you ain't a Nord
2: Irileth: Immediately, off to cleaning duty.
Shit. I've done myself in now... Most interesting thing I will do all day is hunt skeevers now. Wish I could be one of the guards in the bandit raid...
2Button1: Shove Off chore duty. I am going to go find the Dovakin instead
2Button2: Guess it is off to grab the mop.
5: *Walking to the cleaning closet in the basement* Wait is that the Dovakin?
*You see the Dovakin, going through the cabinets of the local chef, and he takes out a piece of bread. Adding it to his pocket...*
5Button1: Wait... That's illegal... I need to get him!
5Button2: Dovakin or not, the law is the law. You are Under Arrest!!!
10: Dovakin: Listen, dude, it was just a piece of bread, let it go.
*This bastard thinks he can do whatever he wants and gets away with it?! Not on my watch*
10Button1: You're coming with me criminal scum!
10Button2: It's off to dragonsreach dungeon with you!
